channel.title: Comments on: Let’s Get a Taco
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Pretty close, I think. The Frontier Taco is hard to beat. And I did feel galvanized afterwards. Today my mountainous pile of laundry loomed at me like a titan, but I merely laughed at it and scooped it up with a backhoe.
item.content:encoded: Pretty close, I think. The Frontier Taco is hard to beat. And I did feel galvanized afterwards. Today my mountainous pile of laundry loomed at me like a titan, but I merely laughed at it and scooped it up with a backhoe.

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: But were they, in fact, the best tacos you ever had? :)And are you feeling fortified?
item.content:encoded: But were they, in fact, the best tacos you ever had? :)And are you feeling fortified?

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: That was a damn fine taco. Two tacos, in fact.
item.content:encoded: That was a damn fine taco. Two tacos, in fact.
